items.title: Two men jailed for Grindr targeted thefts
items.description: The two men took cash, phones and passwords after arranging to meet their targets at home.

items.title: Third Palestine Action hunger striker on remand ends protest
items.description: A third individual on remand for alleged offences relating to the Palestine Action group has ended a hunger strike after 49 days.

items.title: Baby followed by BBC back in Gaza hospital after treatment abroad
items.description: The BBC revisits one-year-old Siwar Ashour who was temporarily evacuated to Jordan for medical treatment during the Gaza war.

items.title: Russia escalates attacks on key Ukrainian region of Odesa
items.description: President Volodymyr Zelensky warned the attacks were an attempt by Moscow to block Ukraine's access to maritime logistics.

items.title: US pauses offshore wind projects over security concerns
items.description: The Trump administration has long opposed wind power, most often citing cost and reliability concerns.
